text: This is a list of the heads of state of the modern Serbian state, from its establishment during the Serbian Revolution to the present day. ==Monarchy== ===Revolutionary Serbia (1804–1813)=== {|class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; width:90%" |- ! width=35% colspan=4|Grand Vožd ! width=40% colspan=3|Reign ! width=25% rowspan=2|Claim |- ! width=3%| !
